message:
The InfraGard National Members Alliance held a critical sector forum examining the domestic threat and radicalization issues. INMA Chairman Dr. Kathleen Kiernan and Advisory Board Member Bryan Ware welcomed a distinguished panel consisting of Dawn Scalici, Deputy Under Secretary for Analysis at...

UNDERSTATEMENT OF THE YEAR: “'Threats to our nation’s critical infrastructure do not solely originate from outside our borders,' said INMA Chairman Dr. Kathleen Kiernan."

http://www.infowars.com/infragard-examines-the-domestic-threat
